ygData.subject: Hi & best of luck
ygData.msgSnippet: hello guys. just wanted to say hi & all. i have been reading this list for a longtime now. i never really tinkered cuz i went so broke doing it & didnt even
ygData.messageBody:
hello guys. just wanted to say hi & all. i have been reading this list for a
longtime now. i never really tinkered cuz i went so broke doing it & didnt
even get one point of a skill up. =) glad to see that we are able to make
new things now. gonna try tinkering again as soon as i can get some more
cash in.

BTW, if anyone wants to setup a party on The Rathe. My gnome guildies & I
will donate to the Gnome cause. I beat if we spread the word around we can
get lots of Gnomes together.


Best of luck to all me Gnome Brethens,
Bastin Tinkerhand, Days of Dour
37th lvl Wandering Gnome Wizard
-The Rathe
